org.openbase.bco.dal.lib.simulation.unit

Class AbstractUnitSimulator<UC extends UnitController>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openbase.bco.dal.lib.simulation.unit.AbstractUnitSimulator<UC>
  • Type Parameters:
    UC - the type of unit controller which is used for the simulation.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openbase.jul.iface.Activatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenericUnitSimulator

    public abstract class AbstractUnitSimulator<UC extends UnitController>
extends Object
implements org.openbase.jul.iface.Activatable
    Author:
    Divine Threepwood This class can be extended to implement any unit simulator.

      • activate

        public void activate()
              throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                     InterruptedException
        Method activates this unit simulator.
        Specified by:
        activate in interface org.openbase.jul.iface.Activatable
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown in case the simulator could not be started.
        InterruptedException - is thrown if the current thread is externally interrupted.

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate()
                throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                       InterruptedException
        Method deactivates this simulator by canceling all running simulation tasks.
        Specified by:
        deactivate in interface org.openbase.jul.iface.Activatable
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        InterruptedException - is thrown if the current thread is externally interrupted.

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Method returns true if this simulator is currently active, otherwise false.

        Returns:

      • getUnitController

        public UC getUnitController()
        Method returns the unit controller to apply any service state modification.
        Returns:
        the unit controller representing the unit to simulate.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Method prints an simulator description.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        an description as string.

      • executeSimulationTasks

        protected abstract Collection<Future> executeSimulationTasks()
        Method should return a list of futures of unit task which are used for the unit simulator. Please make sure the tasks are already running and assigned to any global executor service. Note: In case this simulator is deactivated all running tasks are canceled via the given future list.
        Returns:
        a collection of task futures.
